idea:
Automotive repairs is a highly opaque and cumbersome process. There is no way to tell what goes on at the workshop whilst the vehicle is away from sight. Not to mention the inconvenience that comes with it.

Once the vehicle reaches the workshop, a set of modular cameras get attached to the vehicle which record and stream everything to the consumer. Besides, value added features such as discovery of workshops, booking with pick-up and drop facility, estimate approval, payment of invoice, etc are also available.
name: RABBLE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Doing Joint Venture with running resort at 12 km away allibaugh .currently it's having 5 Room with swimming pool and 3 tent.we will develop to 20 Rooms and other facility as per guideline of MTDC of india.Our company Brand Name Is WELLINN it under Trade Mark.We will also provide wellness in our service including Air Tickets,Hotel, Car, indoor and out door games with gymnasium,restaurant and Bar,Event and Destination Marriage and function.corporate get together, in locations like Karjat,Allibaugh and North Goa.
name: AETERNUM BUILDCO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
First eCommerce Marketplace in India to implement Multi Level Marketing Strategy. Under this eCommerce platform Sellers can upload their products for sale with the concept of Multi Level Marketing. Sellers do agree to provide certain % of their sale amount to network marketers who actively involve to get the sales by referring eCommerce website to new customers.


Provisional patent applied in India for this newly developed system. We have tie up with PayuMoney to manage receipts of  Payment from customers & transfer the same to the Sellers.


This program will help Indian youth to have new source of getting additional income. We are not direct selling company we are Marketplace who help sellers to sale their products with the concept Multi Level Marketing.


Network Marketers by referring website to customer earn income when their referred person buy product online. Network Marketers up line will also be able to get income up to 10 level. Network Marketer can refer by sharing the link of of the eCommerce platform product which have inbuilt referral ID.
name: ANSAITA MARKETPLACE PRIVATE LIMITED
